lines.text: Oh, I beg my pardon. I bow my stomach at you very reverent.
That's all right. Happy cherry blossoms to you, please.
All right, here he coming. Time to shooting now, I hope.
No, no. No, wait, please. Japanese custom say always shooting a man in the back, please.
Hello, please. Must shooting the rope right in the center of the middle, just like the Lone Ranger.
[Bullets from Japanese guns fly about around Donald]
